creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Rectangular plain weave cloth with bands of embroidery. Motifs of birds, fish, octopi, other animals, in shades of brown and cream. Three seams. Badly deteriorated.
object_name: Rectangular Cloth with Birds, Fish, and Octopi
title: Rectangular Cloth with Birds, Fish, and Octopi
